Tracy.Mountain House High School:
Mountain House High School  is a four-year, public secondary school located in the town of Mountain House near Tracy, California.


== Ground Breaking ==
On July 17, 2012, Lammersville Joint Unified School District broke ground on the school with the plan to open in August 2014.
The school opened June 28, 2014 and welcomed its first students on August 20, 2014.
